name: GundamWars v1.5
description:
Iron-Sword-Games(Aka) Cyborg Software Are The Full Author Of Gundam Wars.

WARNING! GPU and CPU Intensive Gundam Wars Is a RTS 2 Player Game Where The Goal Is To Gather Vaspene Grow Army Destroy Your Opponent Thats if the AI Doesnt Destroy Your Ships Before Reaching Your Opponent 

Controls: (Player1: WASD/Spacebar) (Player2 arrows up/down/left/right/Enter)

Georg David Labuschagne

RTS Fast Paced Action Game( For PC Only)(Powered By Blender)

Multiplayer Offline Is The Only Mode Available So Far
